name: Span
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span
description: Span represents a span in a trace record. Spans are contained in a trace and arranged in a forest. That is, each span may be a root span or have a parent span, and may have zero or more children.

methods.name: trace
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#trace
methods.description: The Trace object containing this span.

methods.name: parent
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#parent
methods.description: The TraceSpan object representing this span’s parent, or nil if this span is a root span.

methods.name: span_id
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#span_id
methods.description: The numeric ID of this span.

methods.name: parent_span_id
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#parent_span_id
methods.description:
The ID of the parent span, as an integer that may be zero if this is a true root span.

Note that it is possible for a span to be “orphaned”, that is, to be a root span with a nonzero parent ID, indicating that parent has not (yet) been written. In that case, parent will return nil, but parent_span_id will have a value.

methods.name: kind
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#kind
methods.description: The kind of this span.

methods.name: kind=
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#kind=
methods.description: The kind of this span.

methods.name: name
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#name
methods.description: The name of this span.

methods.name: name=
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#name=
methods.description: The name of this span.

methods.name: start_time
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#start_time
methods.description: The starting timestamp of this span in UTC, or nil if the starting timestamp has not yet been populated.

methods.name: start_time=
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#start_time=
methods.description: The starting timestamp of this span in UTC, or nil if the starting timestamp has not yet been populated.

methods.name: end_time
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#end_time
methods.description: The ending timestamp of this span in UTC, or nil if the ending timestamp has not yet been populated.

methods.name: end_time=
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#end_time=
methods.description: The ending timestamp of this span in UTC, or nil if the ending timestamp has not yet been populated.

methods.name: labels
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#labels
methods.description: The properties of this span.

methods.name: eql?
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#eql?
methods.description: Standard value equality check for this object.

methods.name: from_grpc
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span.from_grpc
methods.description: Create a new Span object from a TraceSpan protobuf and insert it into the given trace.

params.name: span_proto
params.description:
The
span protobuf from the V1 gRPC Trace API.

params.name: trace
params.description:
The trace object
to contain the span.

methods.name: to_grpc
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#to_grpc
methods.description: Convert this Span object to an equivalent TraceSpan protobuf suitable for the V1 gRPC Trace API.

params.name: default_parent_id
params.description:
The parent span ID to use if the
span has no parent in the trace tree. Optional; defaults to 0.

methods.name: exists?
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#exists?
methods.description: Returns true if this span exists. A span exists until it has been removed from its trace.

methods.name: trace_context
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#trace_context
methods.description: Returns the trace context in effect within this span.

methods.name: trace_id
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#trace_id
methods.description: Returns the trace ID for this span.

methods.name: children
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#children
methods.description: Returns a list of children of this span.

methods.name: create_span
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#create_span
methods.description: Creates a new child span under this span.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/trace"

trace_record = Google::Cloud::Trace::TraceRecord.new "my-project"
span = trace_record.create_span "root_span"
subspan = span.create_span "subspan"

params.name: span_id
params.description:
The numeric ID of the span, or nil to
generate a new random unique ID. Optional (defaults to nil).

params.name: start_time
params.description:
The starting timestamp, or nil if not yet
specified. Optional (defaults to nil).

params.name: end_time
params.description:
The ending timestamp, or nil if not yet
specified. Optional (defaults to nil).

params.name: labels
params.description:
The span properties. Optional
(defaults to empty).

methods.name: in_span
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#in_span
methods.description: Creates a root span around the given block. Automatically populates the start and end timestamps. The span (with start time but not end time populated) is yielded to the block.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/trace"

trace_record = Google::Cloud::Trace::TraceRecord.new "my-project"
trace_record.in_span "root_span" do |span|
  # Do stuff...
  span.in_span "subspan" do |subspan|
    # Do subspan stuff...
  end
  # Do stuff...
end

params.name: labels
params.description:
The span properties. Optional
(defaults to empty).

methods.name: start!
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#start!
methods.description: Sets the starting timestamp for this span to the current time. Asserts that the timestamp has not yet been set, and throws a RuntimeError if that is not the case. Also ensures that all ancestor spans have already started, and starts them if not.

methods.name: finish!
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#finish!
methods.description: Sets the ending timestamp for this span to the current time. Asserts that the timestamp has not yet been set, and throws a RuntimeError if that is not the case. Also ensures that all descendant spans have also finished, and finishes them if not.

methods.name: ensure_started
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#ensure_started
methods.description: Sets the starting timestamp for this span to the current time, if it has not yet been set. Also ensures that all ancestor spans have also been started. Does nothing if the starting timestamp for this span is already set.

methods.name: ensure_finished
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#ensure_finished
methods.description: Sets the ending timestamp for this span to the current time, if it has not yet been set. Also ensures that all descendant spans have also been finished. Does nothing if the ending timestamp for this span is already set.

methods.name: delete
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#delete
methods.description: Deletes this span, and all descendant spans. After this completes, Span#exists? will return false.

methods.name: move_under
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
Span#move_under
methods.description: Moves this span under a new parent, which must be part of the same trace. The entire tree under this span moves with it.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/trace"

trace_record = Google::Cloud::Trace::TraceRecord.new "my-project"
root1 = trace_record.create_span "root_span_1"
root2 = trace_record.create_span "root_span_2"
subspan = root1.create_span "subspan"
subspan.move_under root2
